title: DynamicConfig
description: Configuration with dynamic properties following specific patterns

^prefix_[a-zA-Z0-9]+$.description: Any property starting with 'prefix_' must be a string

^num_[a-zA-Z0-9_]+$.description: Any property starting with 'num_' must be a number

^is[A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$.description: Any property in camelCase starting with 'is' must be a boolean

^date_[a-zA-Z0-9_]+$.description: Any property starting with 'date_' must be a valid date-time
